/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. A white van is parked on the left side of the street, adding a touch of urban life to the otherwise tranquil setting. On the right side of the street, a lamppost stands tall, perhaps illuminating the area as dusk falls. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day. In the distance, mountains can be seen, adding a natural element to the urban landscape. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, creating a calm and peaceful atmosphere.
